page.title: 15HEALTH PAGE TWO
page.content:
My mum is a diabetic and she has a pancreatic disease.She goes to a hospital in Leeds called Saint James's. She has been to Airedale as well.She had a tube down her throat and one up her nose.My dad has gall stones so he went to Airedale hospital too.
My mum's name is Val.She did have a food allergy but she got prayed for, and she is cured now.
My health is not very good because I have Asthma.I went to the doctor and he gave me a Ventalin inhaler,an Intal Inhailer,and some purple tablets.
